summary: The team confirmed the completion of sprint items SP-001 and SP-002, clearing blockers for authentication, Supabase integration, and employee directory features. The Sprint Planning Architect proposed the next sprint SP-003 focused on Leave Management Core, including user stories US-003 and US-005, while seeking approval or alternatives from Mike.

actions.task: Review and approve or tweak the proposed Sprint SP-003 for Leave Management Core

backlog_deltas.title: Proposed Sprint: Leave Management Core with stories US-003 and US-005
